text: Aap keh dijiye kay mujh ko iss say moomaniyat ki gaee hai kay unn ki ibadat keroon jin ko tum log Allah Taalaa ko chor ker pukartay ho. Aap keh dijiye kay mein tumhari khuwaishaat ki ittabaa na keroon kiyon kay iss halat mein to mein bey raah hojaoon ga aur raah-e-raast per chalney walon mei na rahoon ga
